fusilli.utils.model_modifier.modify_model_architectureÔÉÅ

modify_model_architecture(model, architecture_modification)[source]ÔÉÅ

Modify the architecture of a deep learning model based on the provided configuration.

Parameters:

  • model (nn.Module) ‚Äì The original deep learning model.

  • architecture_modification (dict) ‚Äì A dictionary containing architecture modifications. Input format {‚Äúmodel‚Äù: {‚Äúlayer_group‚Äù: ‚Äúmodification‚Äù}, ‚Ä¶}. e.g. {‚ÄúTabularCrossmodalAttention‚Äù: {‚Äúmod1_layers‚Äù: new mod 1 layers nn.ModuleDict}}

Returns:

The modified deep learning model.

Return type:

nn.Module
